<h1 align="center" style="font-weight: bold;">URL Shortener ðŸ”—</h1>

<h4 align="center">
  <b>API for shortening URLs, developed in JAVA 17 and hosted on AWS.</b>
</h4>

---

<h2>Cloning</h3>

```
git clone https://github.com/RodrigoHerzog/Redirect-URL-Shortener-Lambda.git
```

<h2>API</h2>

```
https://lp2kpujqn8.execute-api.us-east-1.amazonaws.com
```

<h2>Endpoints</h2>

| route | description |
| --- | --- |
| <kbd>GET /{urlCode}</kbd> | redirects to original url, see [response details](#get-original-url) |
| <kbd>POST /create</kbd> | creates new short url, see [request details](#post-new-short-url) |

<h3 id="get-original-url">GET /{urlCode}</h3>

**RESPONSE**
```
> StatusCode: 302 
> Location: {originalURL}
```

<h3 id="post-new-short-url">POST /create</h3>

**REQUEST**
```json
{
  "originalUrl": "https://www.example.com/",
  "expirationTime": "9999999999"
}
```

**RESPONSE**
```json
{
  "code": "xxxxxxxx"
}
```
